label: 天皇
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: The heavenly sovereign of Japan, a term used to describe the occupant of the throne. Did not necessarily, or for that matter, often, possess sovereign authority, which more often accrued to Dharma, or retired, emperors. See in, chiten no kimi.
